SELECT wsb.send_type, wset.execute_we_user_id, wset.target_id, wset.target_type, wseta.sop_attachment_id, wsb.id as sop_base_id, wseta.push_start_time, wseta.push_end_time, wseta.id as excuteTargetAttachId FROM we_sop_execute_target_attachments wseta LEFT JOIN we_sop_execute_target wset ON wset.id = wseta.execute_target_id and wset.del_flag=0 and wset.execute_state=1 LEFT JOIN we_sop_base wsb ON wset.sop_base_id = wsb.id WHERE wsb.del_flag=0 and wsb.del_flag=0 and wsb.send_type=1 and date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') BETWEEN wseta.push_start_time AND wseta.push_end_time and wseta.msg_id is NULL
AND wsb.id=#{sopBaseId}
